3 Label

3.1 Labels

Basic styling. Base class is .sr-label

Markup

<label class="sr-label [modifier class]">Label</label>
.sr-label--disabled
Indicate with the label that the input field that it is label FOR is disabled
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
